page.title: 03CHURCHES, CHAPELS, RELIGION
page.content: In the virtually complete absence of ethnic minorities in the population, religion is confined to the Christian faith. The Anglican Church of England has parish churches at Alwington and Littleham, though here the church is located just outside the block. The Methodist Church has chapels in Littleham and Fairy Cross, though called Alwington Methodist Chapel. The block contains parts of following five parishes; viz. Alwington, Littleham, Abbotsham, Bideford, Buckland Brewer. Except for the part of Bideford parish, the others are all constituents of united benefices of four parishes while the Methodist Chapels also share their ministers. In general, church attendance is low, probably averaging between l0 and l2% of the population who are
